mapper.insert:
select ReviewID_seq.nextval from dual
insert into Review (ReviewID,UserID,PlanID,Region,StartDate,EndDate,ReviewDate,ReviewContent,ReviewTitle,ReviewThumbnail) values(${reviewID},${userID},${planID},#{region},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{reviewDate},#{reviewContent},#{reviewTitle},#{reviewThumbnail})
mapper.select: select r.*, t.nickname from Review r, TOURUSER t where ReviewID = ${reviewID} And r.userid = t.userid
select r.region, r.ReviewTitle, r.StartDate, r.EndDate, r.ReviewID, r.Reviewthumbnail, t.nickname from Review r, TOURUSER t where r.userid = t.userid
select * from Review where Region like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or ReviewTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from Review where (TO_CHAR(StartDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')>= #{startdate} or TO_CHAR(EndDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')>= #{startdate}) and (TO_CHAR(StartDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{enddate} or TO_CHAR(EndDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{enddate})
select * FROM (select * from Review order by reviewID desc) where ROWNUM < = 4
